title: New: SOHLA – Wake
content:
Our friends in Edinburgh, ZZZAP, have launched a new project, the amazingly/stupidly titled All-Time Archipelago.

As well as merging the worlds of art and music via a monthly club night, the group have started putting out music. Their first drop is this Andy Stott like jam from SOHLA. Perhaps more dub based than the ghost-like techno influences found in Stott’s work, there’s still however a correlation to be made; dark brooding synths, sudden and damning snare claps and so smooth it hurts vocal samples all play a hand in the Manchester producer’s work. It all makes for something that could easily have been super generic, yet instead managed to pretty moving.
author: 5e9b68b27a1236eccfeb1d24
